alert.note: Alert for Hamlin (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 01 at 9:53AM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... Pelican Lake near Watertown affecting Codington County. Big Sioux River Near Castlewood affecting Hamlin County. .For sites with a river forecast, the forecast includes precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any future precipitation could affect the forecasts. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sioux River Near Castlewood. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, 184th Street begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:31 AM CDT Monday the stage was 9.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:31 AM CDT Monday was 9.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain near 9.6 feet over the next several days. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Tuesday evening by 700 PM CDT.
